translation.en: Wow!
- Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! - Hey!
Big Tree City
- Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! - Hey!
Big Tree City
- Big Tree City Rescue, let's go! - Hey!
Let's go!
- - That's fantastic!
Smiling faces, colorful balloons, and smooth- talking news anchors.
translation.es: Sonrisas, globos de colores y presentadores amables.

translation.en: It's a windy day for the annual Big Tree City balloon parade,
translation.es: Hay mucho viento en el desfile de globos,

translation.en: famous for its huge balloons.
A marvelous occasion concluding at the glorious Horatio Bear Monument.
translation.es: Un evento que termina en el glorioso Monumento de Horacio.

translation.en: Parade day!
Balloons! Barade palloons!
Oh, I always wanted to see the famous parade balloons!
It's my first time!
Shall we go, then?
Yes. It's going to be amazing!
Ah! It sure is.
It's gonna be great. Isn't it, Splash? Yeah. I can't wait!
translation.es: - Va a ser genial. ¿No, Splash? - ¡Estoy ansioso!

translation.en: Me too. It's gonna be fantastic.
A real doozy. A real doozy?
Just you and me. Plumbing.
translation.es: Solo tú y yo. Y la plomería.

translation.en: Plumbing?
Plumbing.
See?
This means it's Bonding Day with Splash.
translation.es: Es Día de Unión con Splash.

translation.en: You are gonna teach me all about plumbing, right here in HQ.
translation.es: Me enseñarás todo sobre plomería en el cuartel.

translation.en: - And we'll bond.  - Ah.
Hey, Major, I was thinking, with the parade happening and everything,
translation.es: Mayor, estuve pensando que con el desfile y eso,

translation.en: maybe we could delay Bonding Day.
- - Uh, one moment, Splash.
Big Tree City Rescue, ready to rescue you.
Oh no. Team, to the briefing room.
translation.es: No… A la sala de reuniones.

translation.en: Listen up, team.
Mr. Pig has got himself stuck in a bin on the parade path.
translation.es: El Señor cerdo quedó atrapado en un basurero.

translation.en: If we don't help him, it could ruin the parade.
- - And the beloved balloons.
Pecky, Flame, Stripes, get him out of there without disrupting the parade.
translation.es: Pecky, Flame, Stripes, sáquenlo del desfile.

translation.en: Move out!
Splash, I have a very special high- priority job for you.
translation.es: Splash, tengo un trabajo importante y prioritario para ti.

translation.en: - Teach me to plumb. -
Right. So, I'm going to demonstrate the basics of plumbing
translation.es: Voy a demostrar las bases de la plomería

translation.en: with this broken soap dispenser.
Doesn't look broken.
- - Oh! Sorry, Splash.
Hmm. Looks like fixing this will take all day.
Well, if we fix it before the parade finishes,
we can still see the…  …balloons.
translation.es: podremos ver el desfile y los globos.

translation.en: - The parade is closing in! - We need to get Mr. Pig out of that bin.
translation.es: - ¡Ahí viene! - Hay que sacar a Señor cerdo.

translation.en: Over here!
Help me!
Okay. Go over it again, Mr. Pig.
How exactly did you get stuck in a bin?
Well, I bought some potatoes to eat while watching the parade,
and, well, you know, things got a bit out of hand.
translation.es: y las cosas se salieron de control.

translation.en: How long's this going to take? I mean, I can't see the parade.
translation.es: ¿Cuánto tardarán? No puedo ver el desfile.

translation.en: - I can't get him out. - Stand clear!
We need maximum power!
I'll be gentle.
- Come on! -
Come on!
Did it work?
Major, Mr. Pig is stuck in a bin stuck in a crater.
translation.es: Señor cerdo está atrapado en un cráter.

translation.en: - What do we do? - Come again?
Mr. Pig is now in a crater in the middle of the road.
If we don't do something, we'll have to cancel the parade.
translation.es: Si no hacemos algo, se cancela el desfile.

translation.en: - You better take a look. The balloons-- - Balloons! No, no, no!
No problem.  I don't need to see the balloons.
translation.es: No hay problema. No necesito ver globos.

translation.en: I'll simply reroute the parade down another road.
translation.es: Llevaré el desfile a otra calle.

translation.en: Oh, Major.
What if we reroute the parade to go past HQ?
translation.es: ¿Y si el desfile viene hacia aquí?

translation.en: Then we can do Bonding Day and see the parade.
Bring the massive balloons here?
My, my, what a creative idea.
Yes, I'll do that right away.
This route will completely avoid headquarters.
translation.es: Esta ruta esquivará el cuartel general.

translation.en: The parade must not come past HQ.
translation.es: El desfile no debe pasar por aquí.

translation.en: Never!
Right past HQ?
Right past HQ.
There. Nowhere near HQ. Mm- hmm.
Stripes, I'm sending you the new route now.
translation.es: Stripes, te envío la nueva ruta.

translation.en: Major, is this correct?
Yes. Totally correct.
Even though it goes over Windy Bridge, the bridge notorious for being extremely windy and terribly unsafe?
translation.es: ¿Aunque pasa por el Puente ventoso, famoso por su peligrosidad?

translation.en: Yep.
The parade has been rerouted. Follow me.
Hmm. Much as I suspected.
Major, we have a problem.
- The wind on Windy Bridge is too windy. -
translation.es: El Puente ventoso es muy ventoso.

translation.en: The balloons are lifting people into the air.
translation.es: La gente vuela por el aire.

translation.en: Oh no! Secure the balloons to the bridge and get the civilians out of there.
translation.es: ¡No! Aten los globos al puente y saquen a la gente.

translation.en: Yes.
Please make your way off the bridge. Please make your way off the bridge.
Chaotic scenes as Big Tree City Rescue prevent the parade from blowing away.
translation.es: En el caos, los Rescatistas impiden que el desfile se vuele.

translation.en: - Major? -
Windy Bridge leads away from HQ.
translation.es: Ese puente los aleja del cuartel.

translation.en: Ooh, uh, Splash, I didn't want the parade to go past HQ.
translation.es: No quería que el desfile pasara por aquí.

translation.en: So I rerouted it in completely the opposite direction.
translation.es: Así que lo desvié en la dirección opuesta.

translation.en: But why?
I have a phobia.
- Of wind? - No, of balloons.
- Ooh, I'm petrified of 'em. - But balloons are great.
They're bouncy and funny, and when you pop them, they go bang!
Exactly. The way they wobble about, floating like ghosts.
translation.es: Exacto. Se bambolean flotando como fantasmas.

translation.en: But it’s the popping I dread the most.
And the Big Tree City balloons are the biggest balloons you’ve ever seen.
translation.es: Y estos son los globos más grandes que hay.

translation.en: I've never seen the balloons before.
What? Really?
I've always wanted to see the Big Tree City Parade, ever since I was a tadpole.
translation.es: Siempre quise ver el desfile, desde que era un renacuajo.

translation.en: But I forgot about Bonding Day, and I don't wanna let you down.
translation.es: Pero olvidé el Día de Unión y no quiero decepcionarte.

translation.en: I'm the one who let you down, Splash.
translation.es: Yo soy el que te decepcionó.

translation.en: I used Bonding Day as an excuse to avoid the balloons,
translation.es: Puse una excusa para evitar los globos

translation.en: and in doing so, ruined Parade Day for you.
translation.es: y te arruiné el Día del Desfile.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Ah, don't worry. I'll see the parade next year.
translation.es: No importa. Lo veré otra vez.

translation.en: Besides, the balloons aren't going anywhere.
translation.es: Y los globos no se irán.

translation.en: - The balloons are going somewhere. - No!
- Oh no! - The bridge!
Major, the bridge is airborne.
translation.es: El puente está en el aire.

translation.en: Ah! Hold tight. Prickles is on the case.
I'll come up with a plan. Oh, plan, plan. Need a plan.
translation.es: Pensaré algún plan. Necesito un plan.

translation.en: Oh, I can't think straight when there are balloons involved.
translation.es: No puedo pensar si hay globos.

translation.en: I've got a plan.
Amazing.
Ah, look, you can see the Horatio Square Monument from here.
translation.es: Miren, desde aquí se ve el Monumento de Horacio.

translation.en: - - Oh no! We're headed straight for it!
How are we gonna stop this bridge?
Don't worry, everyone. We're here.
Oh, this is most undignified.
They're everything I imagined.
No! They're everything I imagined!
Right. Seen 'em now. Let's get this bridge back on the ground
translation.es: Listo. Ya los vi. Bajaré este puente antes de que se estrelle.

translation.en: before it crashes into Horatio Bear Monument. For Bonding Day!
translation.es: Bajaré este puente antes de que se estrelle. ¡Por el Día de Unión!

translation.en: For Bonding Day!
Goodness, I just popped a balloon and it was fun.
translation.es: Acabo de explotar un globo y fue divertido.

translation.en: See? Balloons are fun!
Balloons are fun!
This is for all those birthday parties I could've gone to. Hi- ya!
translation.es: Por todas las fiestas a las que no fui.

translation.en: They're using Major Prickles's spiky bum as a weapon!
translation.es: ¡Usan el trasero de Prickles como arma!

translation.en: This is for all those hot- air balloon rides I missed out on.
translation.es: Por los viajes en globo que me perdí.

translation.en: - Quick, Major! We're running out of time! - I'm on it.
- - One more!
And this is for the time my sister got married in that balloon factory.
translation.es: Por la boda de mi hermana en esa fábrica de globos.

translation.en: You did it, Major!
All thanks to you, Splash. Bonding Day complete.
translation.es: Gracias a ti. Día de Unión completo.

translation.en: Yay!
The Big Tree City Parade's latest addition of a screaming, flying hedgehog is a hit.
translation.es: La incorporación de un erizo volador al desfile es un éxito.

translation.en: We look forward to seeing it next year. I'm Ted Lister.
translation.es: Esperamos verlo el próximo año. Soy Ted Lister.

translation.en: Exercise!
It's the most important meal of the day.
And I eat exercise for breakfast.
But it's a meal I must eat on my own.
translation.es: Es una comida que debo comer solo.

translation.en: If only I could exercise with the team. But I must do it in secret.
translation.es: Si pudiera ejercitarme con ellos… Pero debo ocultarme.

translation.en: No one must ever see…
the sweating!
What are you doing, Major? You gonna exercise with us?
Oh! Oh, uh, wait, I…
Let's get a sweat on!
Sweat? No! There's no need to sweat.
Who's sweating? Definitely not me.
We've never worked out together. I'll join you!
No, no. No need. No need.
- I usually work out solo. Oh. -
Wanna lift some weights with me, Major? Really makes you…
translation.es: ¿Levantamos pesas juntos? Te hace sudar mucho.

translation.en: …sweaty.
Oh, no, thanks, Pecky. Ooh!
Check it out, Major. This bike powers a smoothie maker.
The more you pedal, the more power it generates.
It's great for building up a sweat. Wanna have a go, Major?
- Ah! I can't. No. - Why not?
- Uh, the telephone might ring. - Are you avoiding exercise, Major?
What? That's… Why would I…
Oh, I mean, don't be silly.
- - Oh, telephone! Thank goodness, an emergency.
Big Tree Exercise, how can I sweat you?
Really? Oh no. Team, to the briefing room.
translation.es: ¿En serio? A la sala de reuniones.

translation.en: What's gotten into him?
There's been a power cut at the Big Tree City Music Stadium.
translation.es: Se cortó la luz en el estadio musical.

translation.en: And the famous pop star Lil JJ is performing a concert there tonight.
translation.es: Y la famosa estrella pop Lil JJ dará un concierto allí.

translation.en: Not Lil JJ!
The best pop star ever! I'm her biggest fan.
Excuse me. I'm her biggest fan. Have you even heard her new hit single?
translation.es: Esa soy yo. ¿Escuchaste su nueva canción?

translation.en: Yes, I have. And did you know that she's playing it at tonight's concert?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Y sabías que la cantará esta noche?

translation.en: Unless we fix the power at the stadium, there won't be a concert.
No power, no lights, no sound.
And no Lil JJ.
- No! - No!
This is top priority. Kit and I will head over
translation.es: Esto es prioridad. Kit y yo iremos a la central de energía.

translation.en: to the power station and see if we can fix the problem.
translation.es: Kit y yo iremos a la central de energía.

translation.en: Meanwhile, Flame and Tricks take a backup power generator to the stadium in case anything goes wrong.
translation.es: Flame y Tricks llevarán un generador por si algo falla.

translation.en: - Yes, Major. - Move out!
Connections connected.
It's amazing to think that Lil JJ's concert
might be powered by my generator. Huh?
But it'll only be running thanks to me starting it.
translation.es: Pero solo funcionará si yo lo enciendo.

translation.en: - Oh no! Tricks, fix it! - What are we gonna do?
The concert starts soon!
It's Lil JJ.
She's amazing.
We should say hi. Yeah, but be cool.
It's you! It's really you! Hi, hello. Welcome. I'm Flicks. This is Trame.
translation.es: ¡Eres tú! ¡Hola! Soy Flicks. Ella es Trame.

translation.en: Hello. Hi, how are you? Sorry to bother you. We're just… Wowzers!
- I'm your biggest fan! - Is that so?
translation.es: ¡Soy tu fan número uno! ¿De verdad? Son muy dulces.

translation.en: Aren't you the sweetest?
Wanna come backstage?
Yes, please!
Like I was saying, I'm your biggest fan.
Uh, second biggest. I'm your biggest fan.
translation.es: La dos. Yo soy el número uno.

translation.en: Well, I'm really bigger than you, so I guess I'm the biggest fan.
translation.es: Soy más grande que tú, así que voy primero.

translation.en: Okay, Major. Looks like we can get the stadium's power back on
translation.es: Muy bien. Podemos tener electricidad si jalamos ese interruptor.

translation.en: with a simple pull of that switch.
translation.es: Podemos tener electricidad si jalamos ese interruptor.

translation.en: Oh, good. Just a pull of a switch and off we go.
translation.es: Qué bien. Jalamos el interruptor y listo.

translation.en: Oh! Had I known we were exercising, I would've worn a sweatband.
translation.es: No estoy vestido para hacer ejercicio.

translation.en: Hmm. Not quite as straightforward as I was expecting, but this shouldn't be too difficult. I just need to…
translation.es: No es tan simple como esperaba, pero no debería ser difícil.

translation.en: What was that?
- Nothing. - Thought I heard a splat.
Uh, nope.  No splat. Definitely not. No.
translation.es: No. Nada de eso. En absoluto.

translation.en: Are we done? Is the power back on?
Almost. We just need to pull these things 200 times,
this thing 800 times, 50 sets of those, push this heavy button 1,000 times,
translation.es: esto 800 veces, esto 50 veces, apretar esto 1000 veces,

translation.en: pull on these, tug on this, then trek 300 miles. But we have to do it together.
translation.es: jalar de esto, empujar esto y caminar 500 kilómetros.

translation.en: Major?
Major? What's going on?
I'm not sweating.
What? The concert's starting soon and we still haven't got the power on.
translation.es: Ya empieza el show y no hay electricidad.

translation.en: All that gadgetry will take far too long.
Besides, Flame and Tricks have it all under control.  - Get in, Kit. -
translation.es: Además, Flame y Tricks lo tienen bajo control. Sube.

translation.en: Tonight's concert will feature all my best songs.
translation.es: Esta noche tocaré mis mejores canciones.

translation.en: Much better than last year, when I only played all my worst songs.
translation.es: El año pasado toqué solo mis peores canciones.

translation.en: Anyway, I better get ready. It's nearly showtime.
translation.es: Mejor me preparo. Ya empieza el show.

translation.en: Tricks. Flame. Everything okay at the stadium?
Tell me everything's okay. All okay, isn't it?
OMG, it's brilliant!
translation.es: - ¡Dios mío, es fabuloso! - ¡El mejor día de todos!

translation.en: Best day ever! It's going so well! So well!
translation.es: - ¡Dios mío, es fabuloso! - ¡El mejor día de todos! ¡Todo va bien!

translation.en: Excellent! So you've got the generator running.
- Tricks couldn't start it! - Flame broke it!  It was my fault!
Oh well. We could go back to the power station and--
It's no good. We'll have to cancel the concert. Cancel it.
This is a disaster. No power, no way to find the power or power it.
translation.es: No hay luz para iluminar mis ideas.

translation.en: No, there's just no possible way…
to generate the power.
How about we use the exercise bike?
Brilliant, Stripes. We can power the concert
translation.es: - ¿Y si usamos esta bicicleta? - Genial. Generaremos energía pedaleando unas horas.

translation.en: by pedaling really hard for just a few hours.
Like a really intense gym session.
Yes. Let's build up a sweat and save the Lil JJ concert.
translation.es: Sí. Vamos a sudar para salvar el concierto de Lil JJ.

translation.en: Anyone got any other ideas?
Music is my passion It's never out of fashion
translation.es: La música es mi pasión, por eso hice esta canción.

translation.en: Pop songs are for everyone Even if they're really not
translation.es: Las canciones pop son para todos, aunque, en realidad, no lo son.

translation.en: Like this one It goes on and on and on
translation.es: Como esta, que sigue, sigue y sigue.

translation.en: Let's all dance together Come on
I want to dance all night and forever
translation.es: Quiero bailar toda la noche y mucho.

translation.en: I wanna get a sweat on And on and on and on
translation.es: Quiero sudar una vez, otra vez y otra vez.

translation.en: Come on. The last song is nearly finished. Use every last bit of energy you have.
translation.es: Vamos. Ya casi termina el show. Usa la energía que te queda.

translation.en: Thank you, thank you!
It's been such a wonderful night, and you've been such a wonderful audience!
translation.es: ¡Es una noche maravillosa, y ustedes son un público maravilloso!

translation.en: We did it, team.
Let's all go home.
My legs.
I… I hate music.
And the show is not over yet, people. I'll now perform my new hit single!
translation.es: El concierto no terminó. ¡Ahora cantaré mi nuevo sencillo!

translation.en: - What? - Huh?
It's the new song.
Huh? Another song?
Okay, who's up for more cycling?
- Stripes? - I was before Kit.
Is it Pecky's go?
Ma… Maximum power.
We're losing power.
Quick! Someone has to pedal.
We can't. We've got no energy left.
translation.es: No podemos. No nos queda energía.

translation.en: You're the only one who can pedal, Major.
translation.es: Eres el único que puede hacerlo.

translation.en: But I can't.
Why not?
Because
I sweat, Kit. I sweat bad.
I mean, really bad.
Every time the team exercises, I feel I have to hide away.
translation.es: Cuando se ejercitan, siento que debo esconderme.

translation.en: Don't hide away That's what I say
But I sweat. I sweat a lot. Someone might laugh at me.
translation.es: Pero sudo. Sudo mucho. Alguien podría burlarse de mí.

translation.en: Friends won't laugh It's okay
I should just do it.
You need to show them Who you really are
translation.es: Debes demostrarles quién eres de verdad.

translation.en: Show the real me.
We failed!
The concert's ruined.
- Huh? - What?
Stand back, everyone. This hedgehog's going to get a sweat on!
translation.es: Apártense todos. ¡Este erizo va a sudar!

translation.en: Let's make this the best concert ever!
Pick yourself up when you are blue
…turn on to me
Power up, power up, power up
translation.es: Enciéndete conmigo. Enciende tu energía, enciéndete.

translation.en: - Amazing! - Go, Major!
See, Major? You're not even sweating that mu-- Ugh!
- Where is it all coming from? - Gross!
You were right, Kit. There's no need to be embarrassed.
translation.es: Tenías razón, Kit. No debo avergonzarme.

translation.en: Yeah…
Major, you're generating too much power!
I feel like a new hog! A hog who can sweat as much as he likes!
translation.es: ¡Soy un erizo nuevo! ¡Puedo sudar todo lo que quiera!

translation.en: Yeah Whoa, whoa…
It's all going to collapse! We need to secure the stage!
Kit, water!
- Yes, Major. -
I've been hiding my perspiration away all my life,
translation.es: Oculté mi sudor toda la vida,

translation.en: and there was never a need to.
- It's okay to sweat, isn't it? - Yep.
Don't be afraid to show the real you
translation.es: No tengas miedo de mostrar tu verdadero yo.

translation.en: - You did it, Major. -
We all did it.
Let's hear it for Big Tree City Rescue!
When it came to saving the concert, they truly had the power.
translation.es: Pusieron la energía necesaria para salvar el concierto.

translation.en: So, all the electricity is generated by that little machine of yours?
translation.es: Entonces, ¿esa maquinita genera toda la electricidad?

translation.en: That's correct.
So who's pedaling now?
